name: Approve/decline new group membership according to submitted answer of the applicant
description: When a new request to join a group is received in Meetup, Make decide whether to approve or decline the request according to the submitted answer. It is needed to set up the question in group settings->your members: 1) New member approval - check organizer must approve, 2) When members join - check Require profile questions, 3) Profile questions - set up the question with only one possible correct answer, for example capital city of a country, question with answer yes/no.
